Name: Virus Protocol
About the game: >> A new player is has joined the world ???: Let pandemic be over. ???: Oops, I am sorry. Did I say 'Over'? ???: I mean 'All over the world'. ???: Hi, I am a virus. Virus: Let me destroy the white cells and go here and there. Virus: Please, help me out. Attack white cells and get to the door You are a virus in a human's body. Which means white cells will attack you. Shoot them down and get to the door. A boss will not let you get to the door until it is dead. Auto shooting system When a virus is near enough to enemy, it will shoot the target automatically. But not while you are moving. Copy yourselves Pick up a heart to make a copy of yourself or two. The other you will do everything you do at different position. Use them to shoot more or turn on a switch in a distance. A classic platformer Virus Protol is a classic platformer game. Which has a lot of gimmicks to get through and you have to jump around everywhere. Diamond achievements You can find 4 diamonds in the lobby. Each has a different condition to turn on the light in the diamond. Try lighting them all.
